DOC.brief_summary: This Phase II , open-label , single-arm , multicenter study intravesical BCG plus ALT-803 patient BCG unresponsive high grade non-muscle invasive bladder cancer ( NMIBC ) . All patient treat study receive via urinary catheter bladder , BCG plus ALT-803 weekly 6 consecutive week ( induction ) . Patients without disease progression Months 3 , 6 , 9 12 eligible continue BCG+ALT-803 treatment ( maintenance ) . The study duration 24 month .
